text:
Instead of blasting all of them with a Holder license, we'd love to get introductions to the ones that may be BTC users.

Use cases for CBTC generally involve trading, custody/wallets, app development (DEX, lending pool), liquidity provision, BTC yield.

Hi <@U05GJ6H5BTN>! Circling back on Holder and Minter..

(It was nice for Chris Z to apologize yesterday, though he didn't have to. He's doing his job, enforcing accountability and standards in the community.)

Of the validators that you run, do you have a sense for which of them may have a use case for CBTC?

text:
Hi there <@U05GJ6H5BTN>! following up on our conversation here.

Exciting news, we just issued our first Early Bird Minter license this week.

This costs $10,000/yr, pays the same rewards (ie around $2,500/mo currently) and lets you mint/burn up to 100 BTC/yr. CBTC Early Bird Minter MSA: <http://bit.ly/early-bird-minter|http://bit.ly/early-bird-minter>

Would you guys be interested in that one as well?
